title: Are region free DVD players legal? - Quora
tags: Legal Issues and Law in Everyday Life

response.answer_text: yes most DVD players are made region free and then the region is "switched" for the area of sale ( actually the chip is made with the region selected) but often by entering the service mode of the player, usually by switching the machine off and on and holding down a certain sequence of buttons on the remote, the region can be changed for example Samsung DVD-E360 region code
